reviews.review:
Personally, I'm not good with reviews, but I will say I do like the game. 
I like this game. It's simple concept of going from one place to another is most definately expanded on from level 1 to the end. It may not stay easy necessarily, but every level feels like it either adds a new concept and expands on it. Another wonderful thing is that when you finish everything (Or not! It is always unlocked!) you can go to the community test chambers and see what players just like you and me have made, or even make one yourself!
Portal2一款旋转跳跃闭眼的闪现游戏

This game is addictive and challenging!

An excellent sequel to an excellent small game. Portal 2 may not be as revolutionary as it's predecesor, but succeeds in giving us more challenge puzzles, more elements to interact with, a new and funny story and a coop campaign. Single player feels more like a tutorial mode for the cooperative campaign, so if you don't have any friend to play it then I sujest you pick this game up cheap. Highly recommended if you enjoyed Portal 1 and want more.

esta muy bueno el juego es 100% recomendable

[h1]Phenomenal game! This is a must have![/h1]


[h1]Game Mechanics[/h1]
The game mechanics of Portal 1 were already amazing, but in Portal 2 they are even better. Adding the gels adds a whole new element to the game. The way the portals work and the momentum works feels much nicer compared to the first game. The controls are tight and all can be changed.

[h1]Graphics[/h1]
This game by no means looks realistic. It is a stylized game and it looks beautiful. This is in the same realm as Mirrors Edge or Wind Waker where it is going to be a beautiful game for a long time.

[h1]Optimization[/h1]
I feel like all I have to say is, it's a Valve game. It uses the amazingly optimized Source engine. On my super budget Radeon HD 7750, I could run this game at 1080p 60fps at max settings. My friend could run this game and the same settings on an HP Pavilion with an APU. If you have a computer from the mid to late 2000s or any sort of APU, Intel HD graphics, or graphics card, you should be able to play this game no problem.

[h1]Singleplayer[/h1]
Compared to the first one, Portal 2 focuses more on the comedy and story progression as opposed to the puzzles and difficulty. Don't get me wrong, the puzzles are still great, but they aren't as fleshed out or difficult as the first one. The story is very well made and kept me interested with only a few plot holes. You get to explore old Aperture and the beautiful run down facility. The voice acting couldn't be better and the entire story sticks with the lore set in the first game.

[h1]Multiplayer[/h1]
The multiplayer is completely optional but I still highly recommend it. It has a loose story that I have never really followed, but the tests and puzzles are very fun, difficult, and well made for two people. It has so much replay ability due to the steam workshop support where people can post both singleplayer and multiplayer maps. This is a great way to have fun and get mad at your friends for not doing something right. [b]I would definitely recommend playing with somebody that you know and not just random people online. It is a much better experience with friends.[/b]

[h1]Overall[/h1]
Do I recommend this game? Yes, yes, 100 times YES! Anyone who doesn't have Portal 2, needs Portal 2.

Der Kauf ist es wert, kauft es euch im sale, an manchen Tagen kann man es für ca. 3-4 Euro kaufen.

Very fun game. Was very glad that it was significantly longer than the first. Can't wait to get into the multiplayer!

Edit : 5 sene sonra tekrar yorum eklemek istedim. Aradan o kadar zaman geçmesine rağmen indirip oynayınca hala aynı zevki veriyor. Başlangıçta farketmemiştim ancak oyuna kendini bağlayan en önemli özelliklerden birisi müzikleriymiş. Arada Spotify'da müziklerini dinlediğim oluyor.



Oyun çok güzel. Satın almadan önce de arkadaşımın hesabında biraz oynama şansım olmuştu. 

Hem oyun içi hikaye olsun hemde bilmece gibi bölümleri olsun çok eğlenceli. 

Portal 1 i oynadıysanız oyunun ana hikayesini burada tamamladıkları için daha bir eğlenceli oluyor. 

Arkadaşlarımızla coop oynamayı eklemeleri çok güzel olmuş tam bir takım işi istiyor. 

Ayrıca modlarla başkalarının yaptığı zor bölümlerle de kendimizi test edebiliyoruz.

Denemedim ama bildiğim kadarıyla biz de bölüm tasarlayabiliyoruz. 

Büyük bir merak ve heyecanla 3. sünü bekliyorum(umarım çıkarırlar).

Kıssadan hisse puzzle oyunu sevenlerin ve zekasına güvenenlerinin oyunu. 

Puan 10/10
нету слов

Продолжение культовой пространственно-физической головоломки.
В наличии: великолепная графика, полноценная сюжетная кампания часов эдак на 10, локальный и онлайновый кооператив, куча других мелких геймплейных новшеств, отличный саундтрек и фирменный юмор.
Конечно, все нововведения не сравнятся с основами порталостроения, заложенными в первой части, да и связей с Half-Life просматривается все меньше... но все равно - сиквел вышел шедевральным.
Probably one of the best games in existence

Офигенная игра. Я не особо люблю шутеры, вроде Half-Life и Team Fortress, но соединение такого жанра с головоломками - что-то невороятное. Уникальный сюжет и особый геймплей, мастерская, с помошью которой можно играть в камерах других игроков и создавать свои и возможность играть вдвоем.
Story si bile bu kadar eğlenceliken hemde yaz indirimindeyken neden hala duruonuz

Una genialata di gioco! Me lo sono goduto tantissimo titolo inmancabile nella libreria di qualsiasi gamer come si deve! Storia fantastica con ottimi tempi di narrazione, un sacco di segreti (scommetto di averne dimenticato qualcuno), gameplay semplice di concetto ma sfruttato al 100% alla perfezione. Grandissimo punto a favore la rigiocabilità, quindi la presenza di una comunity che crea mappe e la modalità coop. Ambientanzione davvero belle anche se in alcuni punti la qualità scende leggermente (circa a metà gioco per poi riprendere alla grande verso la fine). Nonostante si tratti di un gioco del 2012 la grafica risulta comunque godibile. Dimenticavo! Risate assicurate! 

VOTO: 9/10

GLaDOS

A Portal 2-őt egy fantasztikus játéknak tartom.Talán még az előző résznél is jobb.Sőt.

Portal 2 is truly one of the greatest games ever made. Its puzzles are ingeniously designed, giving you enough challenge while not making you rage quit. The Characters of GLaDOS, Wheatly, and Cave Johnson are very flushed out, each being lovable and memorable. This game introduces many new mechanics, the most notable being the gels, to make the puzzles more engaging and fun. This game is nothing short of a masterpiece.

Davvero un gioco emozionante, la storia sta benissimo con il gioco in se, non è fatta tanto per darne una motivazione del perchè questa va in giro per i portali. Dinamiche di gioco senza precedenti, in certi casi è davvero un bel rompicapo, ma allo stesso tempo ti diverti tantissimo.

Portal 2 is the ultimate mind building game with new challenges every time you play. How I've learned to play this games is when you are stuck on a really hard level then you quit, maybe play another game, then come back to it the next day and you know how to complete it. I do not recommend this game for people with no patience or who is a "lets go go go" kind of person. This game takes time, its a mentally stimulating game that gives your mind a challenge. Over all I reallly love this game. I have no recommendations for controllers or anything keyboard works fine for me. If you are thinking about buying it then I would say yes DO IT
